First tier expansion of your city center that provides and gains Standard Adjacencies from all other districts. Lowers the effectiveness of some basic tile improvements.
Standard yield bonuses from adjacent districts. Provides Standard yield bonus for adjacent districts
Second tier expansion of your city center that provides and gains Major Adjacencies from all other districts. Lowers the effectiveness of most basic tile improvements.
Major yield bonuses from adjacent districts. Provides Major yield bonus for adjacent districts
Third tier expansion of your city center that provides and gains Maximal Adjacencies from all other districts. Lowers the effectiveness of all basic tile improvements.
Maximal yield bonuses from adjacent districts. Provides Maximal yield bonus for adjacent districts
Rural Community Placeholder Text.
Rural Community Placeholder Text

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants a Library building in the Campus district whenever it is constructed. The Librariy building provides [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production equal to its intrinsic [ICON_Science] Science output. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+5% [ICON_Science] Science.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants a Amphitheatre building in the Theater Square district whenever it is constructed. The Amphitheatre building gains +1 [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Great Works of Writing slots. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+5% [ICON_Culture] Culture.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants a Market building in the Commercial Hub district whenever it is constructed. +100% [ICON_Gold] Gold from the Market building. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+5% [ICON_Gold] Gold.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Allows an additional district to be built above the usual population limit. +20% [ICON_Production] Production towards engineering projects (Aquaduct, Dam, Canal, and Neighborhoods).

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Enables [ICON_Faith] Faith purchase of buildings in the Entertainment Complex or Waterfront Park district. Plots within 2 tiles of the Entertainment Complex or Waterfront Park district gain +1 Appeal.
Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Harbour and Commercial Hub district buildings are 50% cheaper to purchase with [ICON_Gold] Gold.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants access to the unique Campus district Project: Academic Conference. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Academic Conference Project Grants +20% [ICON_Science] Science from Campus district buildings and a one time [ICON_Culture] Culture bonus equal to your [ICON_Science] Science per turn on completion. Project can be completed 3 times in this city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires a Campus district with at least +4 [ICON_Science] Science base adjacency in this city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_Science] Science.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants access to the unique Theater Square district Project: Publish Great Works. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Publish Great Works Project Grants +150% [ICON_Culture] Culture from [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Great Works of Writing and a one time [ICON_Science] Science bonus equal to your [ICON_Culture] Culture per turn on completion. Project can be completed 3 times in this city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires that the Printing Press Technolgy has been researched. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_Culture] Culture.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants access to the unique Harbor district Project: Foreign Trade Expedition. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Foreign Trade Expedition Project Grants +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold per Luxury and Strategic resource improved at the destination as well as +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes and a free Trader Unit on completion. Project can be completed 3 times in this city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires that a Shipyard has been built in this city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+10% [ICON_Gold] Gold.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants +1 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] Coal and +1 [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] Iron per turn and a free Military Enigneer. Domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes from this city gain +2 [ICON_Production] Production and +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold. Unlocks Steam Power technology if not already researched

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Industrial Zone district gains [ICON_GOLD] Gold equal to its [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production adjacency and recieves a free Factory building whenever the Workshop building is constructed. Grants 1 copy of the unique Luxury Resource Textiles which provides +4 Happiness.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Harbor district gains [ICON_FOOD] Food equal to its [ICON_GOLD] Gold adjacency. Instantly provides +3 [ICON_Citizen] Population upon completion. City growth rate is 30% higher.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Plots within 1 tile of a Campus district with a Library gain +1 Appeal and plots within 2 tiles gain an additional +1 Appeal with a University. Neighborhood districts gain [ICON_Science] Science based on the Appeal of the tile. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Science] Science on tiles with 3 Appeal or higher. [NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_Science] Science on tiles with 5 Appeal or higher. [NEWLINE]+6 [ICON_Science] Science on tiles with 7 Appeal or higher. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_Science] Science.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May build the City Park and Seaside Resort Tile Improvement if not already available. The City Park and Seaside Resort Tile Improvements gain +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture and an additional +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold if adjacent to a Wonder. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_Culture] Culture.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants a Stock Exchange building in the Commercial Hub district whenever a Bank is constructed. +10% [ICON_GOLD] Gold from the Stock Exchange building for every Luxury resource owned. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_Gold] Gold.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May build all [ICON_Power] Power supplying land Tile Improvemnts. All [ICON_Power] Power producing Buildings and Tile Improvements gain +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold. Buildings that provide additional yields when powered receive +2 of their respective yields. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_Power] Power from Misc Sources.

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Allows the Civil Engineer Unit to be recruited and immediatly recruites 1 Civil Engineer Unit. Prevents structural damage from Natural Disasters. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Civil Engineer Units can expend charges to speed [ICON_Production] Production of Non-Engineering (Aqueduct, Dam, Canal, Flood Barrier) Districts and Buildings.
Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Neighborhood districts recieves +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for each adjacent district. +100% [ICON_Production] Production towards Neighborhood districts.
Civil Engineer

Modern era support unit. Can spend a charge to add +20% [ICON_Production] Production towards Non-Engineering Type Districts and +20% [ICON_Production] Production towards Modern Era and later Buildings. [ICON_Production] Production bonus increases for earlier era buildings. 2 build charges.
Publish Great Works
Fund Foreign Trade Expedition
Host Academic Conference
Support Space Race
Support Immigration

Provides [ICON_Culture] Culture while ongoing. Grants +150% [ICON_Culture] Culture from [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Great Works of Writing and a one time [ICON_Science] Science bonus equal to your [ICON_Culture] Culture per turn on completion. Can be completed 3 times. (1/3)

Provides [ICON_Gold] Gold while ongoing. Grants +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold per Luxury and Strategic resource improved at the destination as well as +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes and a free Trader Unit on completion. Can be completed 3 times. (1/3)

Provides [ICON_Science] Science while ongoing. Grants +20% [ICON_Science] Science from Campus district buildings and a one time [ICON_Culture] Culture bonus equal to your [ICON_Science] Science per turn on completion. Can be completed 3 times. (1/3)

Provides [ICON_Culture] Culture while ongoing. Grants +150% [ICON_Culture] Culture from [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Great Works of Writing and a one time [ICON_Science] Science bonus equal to your [ICON_Culture] Culture per turn on completion. Can be completed 3 times. (2/3)

Provides [ICON_Gold] Gold while ongoing. Grants +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold per Luxury and Strategic resource improved at the destination as well as +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes and a free Trader Unit on completion. Can be completed 3 times. (2/3)

Provides [ICON_Science] Science while ongoing. Grants +20% [ICON_Science] Science from Campus district buildings and a one time [ICON_Culture] Culture bonus equal to your [ICON_Science] Science per turn on completion. Can be completed 3 times. (2/3)

Provides [ICON_Culture] Culture while ongoing. Grants +150% [ICON_Culture] Culture from [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Great Works of Writing and a one time [ICON_Science] Science bonus equal to your [ICON_Culture] Culture per turn on completion. Can be completed 3 times. (3/3)

Provides [ICON_Gold] Gold while ongoing. Grants +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold per Luxury and Strategic resource improved at the destination as well as +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes and a free Trader Unit on completion. Can be completed 3 times. (3/3)

Provides [ICON_Science] Science while ongoing. Grants +20% [ICON_Science] Science from Campus district buildings and a one time [ICON_Culture] Culture bonus equal to your [ICON_Science] Science per turn on completion. Can be completed 3 times. (3/3)
Support Space Race
Provides -2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities while active. Grants -4 Loyalty and +1 [ICON_Citizen] Population upon completion.

Agrarian Toil
Urban Migration
+50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production toward Rural Community districts in cities with no specialty districts.
+15% Growth in cities with any Core Expansion district. -1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities in cities with no Core Expansion districts.
+1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith from the adjacent Coast tile
+1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith from the adjacent Ocean tile
All districts receive an additional standard adjacency bonus for being adjacent to another district. +25% [ICON_Production] Production towards the Modern Era Core Expansion.

Allows Farms to be built on Tundra terrain. After Civil Engineering is unlocked Farms can be built on Tundra Hills. In Snow, Tundra, Snow Hills, and Tundra Hills all Mines provide +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and strategic resource accumulation rate is +100%. Trigger a culture bomb when constructung a Rural Community. Tundra and Tundra Hill tiles adjacent to a Rural Community gain +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food, as well as +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Forests.

A district unique to Kongo that can only be constructed in Rainforest or Woods. Replaces the Neighborhood district but is available earlier and cheaper to build. Provides +3 [ICON_Housing] Housing and +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold, regardless of Appeal. Gains +1 [ICON_Food] Food for every adjacent Woods and Rainforest Feature.

May not build Holy Site districts, Rural Community districts, gain Great Prophets, or found Religions. Gains all Beliefs of any Religion that has established itself in a majority of his cities. Receives an Apostle each time he finishes a M'banza or Theater Square district (of that city's majority Religion).

All districts can be built on Forests and Jungle. +2 [ICON_Food] Food, +2 [ICON_Production] Production, and +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold from each [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relic, [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] Artifact, and Sculpture [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] Great Work of Art in addition to the usual [ICON_Culture] Culture. Receive 50% more [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist, [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician, and [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant points. Palace has slots for 5 Great Works.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Stepwell, unique to India.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith if adjacent to a Holy Site district. +1 [ICON_Food] Food if adjacent to a Farm. +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities if adjacent to a Core Expansion District. Additional [ICON_Housing] Housing, [ICON_Faith] Faith, and [ICON_Food] Food as you advance through the Technology and Civics Tree. Prevents [ICON_Food] Food loss during Drought. Cannot be built on Hills or adjacent to another Stepwell.
Krero Prkau

Effects apply to this city only. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants a Marae building in the Theater Square district whenever it is constructed. +2 additional [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each era since constructed or last repaired. +50% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism pressure from this city towards other civilizations in the Modern era. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+5% [ICON_Culture] Culture.
Maori unique Insitution: Krero Prkau

Begin the game with the Sailing and Shipbuilding technologies unlocked and with the ability to enter Ocean tiles. Embarked units gain +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement. Unimproved Woods and Rainforest are +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. Additional +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Mercantilism and +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Conservation. Fishing Boats provide +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and a Culture Bomb to adjacent tiles. Resources cannot be harvested. [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writers cannot be earned. May not build Renaissance or Modern Era Core Expansions.
